name: Kibili: Preschool + Kindergarten
description: Classes blend social-emotional support with gross and fine motor activities, music and art exploration, introduction to early math and language concepts as well as intercultural learning. Each Kibili class has at least one German and one English teacher, both of whom stick to one language while with the group.
fullDescription: Classes blend social-emotional support with gross and fine motor activities, music and art exploration, introduction to early math and language concepts as well as intercultural learning. Each Kibili class has at least one German and one English teacher, both of whom stick to one language while with the group.
whatTheyOffer: Classes blend social-emotional support with gross and fine motor activities, music and art exploration, introduction to early math and language concepts as well as intercultural learning. Each Kibili class has at least one German and one English teacher, both of whom stick to one language while with the group.
howToGetIt: 1. Submit Online Inquiry 2. Attend a tour, or sign up for Open House or Open Classrooms. 3. Submit application together with the application fee of $75 4. Please submit the Parent Interview Form and the Student Evaluation Form / Recommendation to be filled out by the previous preschool or daycare (if applicable) 5. An online parent interview may be required by the Kibili Division Head - you will be informed and provided with an interview date 6. A decision is communicated to parents by the end of February 7. A spot will be awarded: please, accept and continue 8. Sign contract and submit annual fees 9. Complete all Health- and other required forms listed To ensure your child can begin on the first day of school, please submit your signed enrollment agreement by June 30. All remaining enrollment documents must be finalized by July 31.
cost: This is a fee based service with financial aid available.
agency: German International School of Silicon Valley
